37715SEC. 12411. OFFICE OF THE CHIEF SCIENTIST.

37716

37717 (a) In General.--Section 251(e) of the Department of Agriculture

37718Reorganization Act of 1994 (7 U.S.C. 6971(e)) is amended--

37719

37720[[Page 132 STAT. 4979]]

37721

37722 (1) in the subsection heading, by striking ``Research,

37723 Education, and Extension Office'' and inserting ``Office of the

37724 Chief Scientist'';

37725 (2) in paragraph (1), by striking ``Research, Education, and

37726 Extension Office'' and inserting ``Office of the Chief

37727 Scientist'';

37728 (3) in paragraph (2), in the matter preceding subparagraph

37729 (A), by striking ``Research, Education, and Extension Office''

37730 and inserting ``Office of the Chief Scientist'';

37731 (4) in paragraph (3)(C), by striking ``subparagraph (A)

37732 shall not exceed 4 years'' and inserting ``clauses (i) and (iii)

37733 of subparagraph (A) shall be for not less than 3 years'';

37734 (5) by redesignating paragraphs (4) and (5) as paragraphs

37735 (5) and (6), respectively;

37736 (6) by inserting after paragraph (3) the following:

37737 ``(4) Additional leadership duties.--In addition to

37738 selecting the Division Chiefs under paragraph (3), using

37739 available personnel authority under title 5, United States Code,

37740 the Under Secretary shall select personnel--

37741 ``(A) to oversee implementation, training, and

37742 compliance with the scientific integrity policy of the

37743 Department;

37744 ``(B)(i) to integrate strategic program planning and

37745 evaluation functions across the programs of the

37746 Department; and

37747 ``(ii) to help prepare the annual report to Congress

37748 on the relevance and adequacy of programs under the

37749 jurisdiction of the Under Secretary;

37750 ``(C) to assist the Chief Scientist in coordinating

37751 the international engagements of the Department with the

37752 Department of State and other international agencies and

37753 offices of the Federal Government; and

37754 ``(D) to oversee other duties as may be required by

37755 Federal law or Department policy.'';

37756 (7) in paragraph (5) (as so redesignated)--

37757 (A) in subparagraph (A), by striking

37758 ``Notwithstanding'' and inserting the following:

37759 ``(i) Authorization of appropriations.--There

37760 is authorized to be appropriated such sums as are

37761 necessary to fund the costs of Division personnel.

37762 ``(ii) Additional funding.--In addition to

37763 amounts made available under clause (i),

37764 notwithstanding''; and

37765 (B) in subparagraph (C)--

37766 (i) in clause (i), by striking ``and'' at the

37767 end;

37768 (ii) in clause (ii), by striking the period at

37769 the end and inserting ``; and''; and

37770 (iii) by adding at the end the following:

37771 ``(iii) provides strong staff continuity to

37772 the Office of the Chief Scientist.''; and

37773 (8) in paragraph (6) (as so redesignated), by striking

37774 ``Research, Education and Extension Office'' and inserting

37775 ``Office of the Chief Scientist''.

37776

37777 (b) Conforming Amendments.--

37778 (1) Section 251(f)(5)(B) of the Department of Agriculture

37779 Reorganization Act of 1994 (7 U.S.C. 6971(f)(5)(B)) is amended

37780 by striking ``Research, Education and Extension Office'' and

37781 inserting ``Office of the Chief Scientist''.

37782

37783[[Page 132 STAT. 4980]]

37784

37785 (2) Section 296(b)(6)(B) of the Department of Agriculture

37786 Reorganization Act of 1994 (7 U.S.C. 7014(b)(6)(B)) is amended

37787 by striking ``Research, Education, and Extension Office'' and

37788 inserting ``Office of the Chief Scientist''.

37789SEC. 12412. APPOINTMENT OF NATIONAL APPEALS DIVISION HEARING

37790 OFFICERS.

37791

37792 Section 272(e) of the Department of Agriculture Reorganization Act

37793of 1994 (7 U.S.C. 6992(e)) is amended to read as follows:

37794 ``(e) Division Personnel.--

37795 ``(1) In general.--The Director shall recommend to the

37796 Secretary persons for appointment as hearing officers as are

37797 necessary for the conduct of hearings under section 277. The

37798 Director shall appoint such other employees as are necessary for

37799 the administration of the Division. A hearing officer or other

37800 employee of the Division shall have no duties other than those

37801 that are necessary to carry out this subtitle. Each position of

37802 the Division shall be filled by an individual who is not a

37803 political appointee.

37804 ``(2) Political appointee.--In this subsection, the term

37805 `political appointee' means an individual occupying--

37806 ``(A) a position described under sections 5312

37807 through 5316 of title 5, United States Code (relating to

37808 the Executive Schedule);

37809 ``(B) a noncareer position in the Senior Executive

37810 Service, as described under section 3132(a)(7) of that

37811 title;

37812 ``(C) a position in the executive branch of the

37813 Government of a confidential or policy-determining

37814 character under schedule C of subpart C of part 213 of

37815 title 5, Code of Federal Regulations; or

37816 ``(D) a position which has been excepted from the

37817 competitive service by reason of its confidential,

37818 policy-determining, policy-making, or policy-advocating

37819 character.''.

37820SEC. 12413. TRADE AND FOREIGN AGRICULTURAL AFFAIRS.

37821

37822 The Department of Agriculture Reorganization Act of 1994 is

37823amended--

37824 (1) by redesignating subtitle J (7 U.S.C. 7011 et seq.) as

37825 subtitle K; and

37826 (2) by inserting after subtitle I (7 U.S.C. 7005 et seq.)

37827 the following:

37828

37829 ``Subtitle J--Trade and Foreign Agricultural Affairs

37830

37831``SEC. 287. &lt;&lt;NOTE: 7 USC 7007.&gt;&gt; UNDER SECRETARY OF AGRICULTURE

37832 FOR TRADE AND FOREIGN AGRICULTURAL

37833 AFFAIRS.

37834

37835 ``(a) Establishment.--There is established in the Department the

37836position of Under Secretary of Agriculture for Trade and Foreign

37837Agricultural Affairs.

37838 ``(b) Appointment.--The Under Secretary of Agriculture for Trade and

37839Foreign Agricultural Affairs shall be appointed by the President, by and

37840with the advice and consent of the Senate.

37841 ``(c) Functions.--

37842

37843[[Page 132 STAT. 4981]]

37844

37845 ``(1) Principal functions.--The Secretary shall delegate to

37846 the Under Secretary of Agriculture for Trade and Foreign

37847 Agricultural Affairs those functions and duties under the

37848 jurisdiction of the Department that are related to trade and

37849 foreign agricultural affairs.

37850 ``(2) Additional functions.--The Under Secretary of

37851 Agriculture for Trade and Foreign Agricultural Affairs shall

37852 perform such other functions and duties as may be--

37853 ``(A) required by law; or

37854 ``(B) prescribed by the Secretary.''.

37855SEC. 12414. REPEALS.

37856

37857 (a) Department of Agriculture Reorganization Act of 1994.--The

37858following provisions of the Department of Agriculture Reorganization Act

37859of 1994 are repealed:

37860 (1) Section 211 (7 U.S.C. 6911).

37861 (2) Section 213 (7 U.S.C. 6913).

37862 (3) Section 214 (7 U.S.C. 6914).

37863 (4) Section 217 (7 U.S.C. 6917).

37864 (5) Section 247 (7 U.S.C. 6963).

37865 (6) Section 252 (7 U.S.C. 6972).

37866 (7) Section 295 (7 U.S.C. 7013).

37867

37868 (b) Other Provision.--Section 3208 of the Agricultural Act of 2014

37869(7 U.S.C. 6935) is repealed.

37870 (c) &lt;&lt;NOTE: 7 USC 6911 note.&gt;&gt; Rule of Construction.--Nothing in

37871the amendments made by this section shall be construed as affecting--

37872 (1) the authority of the Secretary to continue to carry out

37873 a function vested in, and performed by, the Secretary as of the

37874 date of enactment of this Act under any provision of Federal law

37875 other than the provisions repealed by subsections (a) and (b);

37876 or

37877 (2) the authority of an agency, office, officer, or employee

37878 of the Department of Agriculture to continue to perform all

37879 functions delegated or assigned to the agency, office, officer,

37880 or employee as of the date of enactment of this Act any

37881 provision of Federal law other than the provisions repealed by

37882 subsections (a) and (b).

37886Agriculture Reorganization Act of 1994 (7 U.S.C. 6933(a)) is amended by

37888``The Secretary''.

37892 U.S.C. 6918) (as in effect on the day before the effective date

37893 of the amendments made by section 2(a)(1) of the Presidential

37894 Appointment Efficiency and Streamlining Act of 2011 (Public Law

37895 112-166; 126 Stat. 1283, 1295)) is amended by striking

37896 ``Senate.'' in subsection (b) and all that follows through

37897 ``responsibility for--'' in the matter preceding paragraph (1)

37898 of subsection (d) and inserting the following: ``Senate.

37899

37900 ``(c) Duties of Assistant Secretary of Agriculture for Civil

37901Rights.--The Secretary may delegate to the Assistant Secretary for Civil

37902Rights responsibility for--''.

37903 (2) &lt;&lt;NOTE: 7 USC 6918 note.&gt;&gt; Effective date.--The

37904 amendments made by paragraph (1) take effect on the effective

37905 date described in section 6(a)

37906

37907[[Page 132 STAT. 4982]]

37908

37909 of the Presidential Appointment Efficiency and Streamlining Act

37910 of 2011 (Public Law 112-166; 126 Stat. 1295).

37911SEC. 12416. TERMINATION OF AUTHORITY.

37912
